articles.title: Coinbase, the largest U.S. cryptocurrency exchange, recorded an "earnings surprise" in the third qua..
articles.author: Ahn Gap-Seong
articles.summary: Coinbase, the largest U.S. cryptocurrency exchange, recorded an "earnings surprise" in the third quarter that exceeded Wall Street's expectations. Institutional transaction revenue was $135 million, a whopping 122% increase from the previous quarter. Derivit, a derivatives exchange that completed the acquisition for about $3 billion in August, generated $52 million in revenue. Individual trading by individual investors increased 37% quarter-on-quarter to $59 billion.

articles.author: Ahmed Ziyad
articles.summary: Mastercard is reportedly in talks to buy ZeroHash for up to $2 billion. ZeroHash is a 'crypto backend' that helps other companies offer crypto features without having to build all the complicated tech or deal with regulations themselves. Mastercard has been exploring stablecoin-based settlements and tokenized assets and Zero Hash could give them a ready-made platform to scale those experiments.

articles.title: BGIN Blockchain Limited Spotlights ICERIVER® ALEO AE3 Miner  Oct. 30, 2025 23:50

It has a hashrate of 2 GH/s (±5%) and a power consumption of 3400W (±10%). The AE3 achieves an impressive energy efficiency rating of 1.70 J/M. It is available for pre-order at $5,999 per unit.

articles.title: Coinbase Reports Bitcoin Purchase, Growing Stablecoin Revenue In Q3
articles.summary: Coinbase posted net income of $433 million in the third quarter. Total revenue climbed 25% quarter over quarter to $1.9 billion. Institutional trading volume hit $236 billion, with transaction revenue of $135 million, up 122%. Deribit acquisition contributed $52 million in revenue during the 47 days that the company owned it.

articles.title: Germany's AfD Proposes Bitcoin as Strategic Asset Amid EU Regulation Debate
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: AfD seeks to classify Bitcoin as a strategic asset, challenging EU's MiCA regulations. AfD wants to boost digital sovereignty and financial innovation, aiming to challenge MiCA's regulations.    i.e. it's aimed at boosting digital sovereignty.

articles.title: Crucial Crypto Market Structure Bill Draft Expected from US Senate
articles.author: Bitcoin World
articles.summary: The U.S. Senate Agriculture Committee is preparing to unveil a draft of a bipartisan crypto market structure bill focusing on digital asset commodities. This significant development signals a renewed push for regulatory clarity in the cryptocurrency world.    Eleanor Terrett reports.

articles.title: Viral Presale Attracts $25 Million to Upgrade Bitcoin: Why Bitcoin Hyper Could Soar
articles.author: Brave New Coin
articles.summary: Bitcoin Hyper's presale surpasses $25M. It's a high-speed, scalable Layer-2 solution built to supercharge Bitcoin's network capacity and real-world usability. It integrates a Canonical Bridge and Solana Virtual Machine (SVM).

articles.title: US senator questions USD1 launch on Binance.US following CZ pardon
articles.author: Bit RSS
articles.summary: Senator Chris Murphy alleged corruption over the exchange "promoting Trump crypto" shortly after the US president issued a pardon for Binance founder Changpeng Zhao. Binance is an exchange that promotes Donald Trump's crypto-asset, which is illegal in the US.

articles.title: Canaan Wins 4.5 MW Japan Contract for Mining-Powered Grid Balancing
articles.author: Coinspeaker
articles.summary: Canaan Inc. announced on Oct. 30 a 4.5-megawatt sales contract to deploy its Avalon A1566HA hydro-cooled mining servers for real-time grid balancing in Japan. The Bitcoin mining hardware manufacturer will provide equipment to support power-grid stabilization for a regional utility.

articles.title: Senate Committee Finalizes Updated Crypto Market Structure Bill Draft, Release Expected In Days
articles.author: Coin Gape
articles.summary: The U.S. Senate committee is set to release an updated draft of the Crypto Market Structure Bill. The legislation seeks to create a market structure for the crypto-currencies in the United States. The draft bill is expected to be released soon.
